sqfVmLanguageServer.Executable.Title: SQF-VM Language Server
sqfVmLanguageServer.Executable.PathMappi:
The physical -> virtual path mappings for the language server to use.

Sample:
```json
"sqfVmLanguageServer.Executable.PathMappings": [
    {"physical": "C:/Physical/Path", "virtual": "/Virtual/Path"}
]
```
